_source.text: 4. Cincinnati Bengals- Grade B+: Best Pick- Kevin Zeitler, OG, Wisconsin Best Value- Orson Charles, TE, Georgia I don't see Kirkpatrick as a very big risk and think he was better than Gilmore who went 10th.

, Georgia I don't see Kirkpatrick as a very big risk and think he was **better** **than** Gilmore who went 10th.

_source.text: 9. UCLA: If Brett Hundley is half as good as the hype, then he'll be better than UCLA's alternatives (Kevin Prince and Richard Brehaut).
